Uses of Class
wmnlibanalysis.harmony.PCProfile

  • Packages that use PCProfile 
    Package Description
    wmnlibanalysis.harmony  

    • Uses of PCProfile in wmnlibanalysis.harmony

      Methods in wmnlibanalysis.harmony that return PCProfile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PCProfile PCProfile.getDurationWeightedProfile()
      Creates a PCProfile where the weight of a note's pitch class is weighted using the duration of the note.
      PCProfile PCProfile.normalize()
      Returns a normalized copy of this pitch profile.
      Methods in wmnlibanalysis.harmony with parameters of type PCProfile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double PCProfile.correlation(PCProfile a, PCProfile b)
      Computes the correlation between the two profiles.
      static double PCProfile.euclidean(PCProfile a, PCProfile b)
      Computes the Euclidean distance between profiles.
